title: Charlotte Slente
subtitle:
On my way to the world’s first Global #RefugeeForum I am happy to announce this ambitious partnership to empower Jordanian and Syrian youth in Jordan. 

Private partnerships are an important path to durable solutions for #refugees and host communities.

https://drc.ngo/news/one-of-the-world-s-most-ambitious-multi-stakeholder-partnerships-to-empower-25-000-young-jordanians-and-syrian-refugees-in-jordan …pic.twitter.com/Mm1JguMyZs

title: IGADGRF

title: Ireland UN Geneva
subtitle: As the inaugural Global #RefugeeForum gets underway in Geneva, Minister @davidstantontd speaks about  #CommunitySponsorship programme with Forum participants from across the world. title: Fiona Kendall
subtitle: Gearing up for the Global #RefugeeForum #GRF2019 with my @Medhope_FCEI colleague, Giulia.  Tomorrow, 2000 representatives from almost every nation are expected.  Will they demonstrate a collective commitment to supporting refugees with new concrete pledges? pic.twitter.com/9z18kHabwH

title: Phil Arnold
subtitle: Refugees are people not data. By enabling refugees to become more involved in evidence gathering we humanise people’s situations. Great comment by Ravdanar of Global refugees led network on role of evidence. Couldn’t agree more! #GlobalRefugeeForumpic.twitter.com/uoow3AZ77E

title: Filippo Grandi
